details: Managed IT equipment and resources for Indeed's R&D offices, supporting over 700 users during WFH and Hybrid/RTO periods.
Ensured balanced utilization of team and resources, maintaining consistency in ticket resolution, training, and project work.
Designed, documented, and globally deployed Indeed's Enterprise Printing Solution for over 18,000 users.
Monitored team performance against SLAs and SLOs, ensuring customer-centric service delivery.
Conducted interviews and hired additional support resources to enhance team capabilities.
Developed and maintained effective communication channels with senior management, clients, and team members.

Technical Troubleshooting and Support: Provided direct customer support and resolved software and hardware issues across diverse technical disciplines, including client computing, infrastructure, networking, and system security.
Network Device and Server Management: Collaborated with Infrastructure teams to troubleshoot, install, and manage network devices and servers, ensuring seamless connectivity and system functionality.
Technical Project Execution: Completed various technical projects and tasks, demonstrating adaptability and proactive problem-solving to enhance team productivity and end-user satisfaction.
Documented technology-related inquiries and solutions to compile comprehensive knowledge-base resources.
Provided technical support and troubleshooting to optimize system performance.
Coordinated technical communications and instructions to enhance organizational IT effectiveness.
Responded to service requests, delivering resolutions based on industry knowledge.
Updated departmental documentation, including license databases, infrastructure maps, and FAQs, to maintain consistent response levels.
Conducted remote and onsite testing and troubleshooting for client server infrastructures to ensure operational readiness.
Managed and supported critical public infrastructure systems, ensuring their reliability and security.
Implemented inventory control measures to maintain and replenish IT equipment, supplies, tools, and replacement parts.
Developed modification and integration programs to ensure software compatibility.
Monitored networks and devices to promptly resolve technical problems.
Provided knowledgeable support and quality service to resolve issues and escalate problems effectively.
Acted as the primary liaison between customers and management, addressing and relaying feedback and concerns.
Managed security operations for multiple client networks, systems, and maintenance protocols.
Continuously enhanced operational and security procedures for client environments, including systems administration and maintenance.
Routinely evaluated security measures and recommended remediation to stakeholders.
Identified and resolved hardware and software compatibility issues.
Standardized technical operations reporting to eliminate redundancy and improve efficiency across multidisciplinary teams.
Mitigated risk and managed liability by applying the latest cybersecurity advisories and best practices to internal operations and product development.
Authored technical requirement documentation aligned with business goals and technological constraints.
Resolved program-level dependencies to prevent bottlenecks and maintain efficiency in ongoing efforts.
Implemented and fully managed the Asigra Cloud Backup platform in a multi-client environment.
